title: Miser's Purse, early 19th century
description: Crocheted black silk; embroidered areas of green and yellow silk with stylized flowers of cut steel beads.  More beads are used in triangular pattern.  Two steel rings control side closing; steel bead tassels at one end, steel bead fringe at the other.

tombstone.epitaph:
Miser's Purse, early 19th century.
early 19th century. Medium: silk, metal
Technique: crocheted. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-33.
